ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: Really?? Far out.. I would have thought leaders would have been more civilised. I myself tried to fight Zardus.. but all he did was retreat. Coward *Teltoli

"Really?? Far out.. I would have thought leaders would have been more civilised. I myself tried to fight Zardus.. but all he did was retreat. Coward" 

*Teltoli sighs and dips a paw into the water, finding it had warmed up. She grinned and jumped in, showering Dracona with water*

"well, we've had misunderstandings, i needed some time to think when he
refused to explain why he's turturing his partner...there used to be 2
leaders, but Zardus put Wolfgand into the torture chamber....that's what
upset me....
